full_summary:
# RFP Supply and Install 96 Position Key Safe Cabinet
## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders from qualified suppliers for the supply and installation of a 96-position key safe cabinet.

### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference**: WS4257757704-Doc4257830872
- **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 16, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Tender Description
The tender is for the supply and installation of a 96-position key safe cabinet. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by the tender closing date at 2:00 PM EST. Late responses will be declared non-responsive.

### Important Contact Information
- **Contact Name**: Jean-Robert Goulet
- **Contact Email**: jean-robert.goulet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Countries Affected**: Canada

### Related Government Websites
- **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17729320?extsite=MTc3MjkzMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Key Resources and Trade Agreements
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Truro
- **Procurement Methodology**: Competitive - Open Bidding
